ARABIC: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and you will only be repaid for what you did -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And be rewarded but only for what you had done,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You will only be recompensed according to your deeds.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and will be recompensed only for what you deserve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And you will not be compensated except for your deeds.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you will be requited nothing except for what you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you shall not be rewarded except (for) what you did.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and not be recompensed, except according to what you were doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ye are requited naught save what ye did -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and be rewarded only according to your deeds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And ye shall be required not except for that which ye have been doing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and you will be requited only for what you used to do
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But it will be no more than the retribution of (the Evil) that ye have wrought;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you will be requited nothing except for what you used to do (evil deeds, sins, and Allah's disobedience which you used to do in this world);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but you shall not be recompensed except for what you were doing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And you will be repaid only for what you used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:39] and you will only be requited, the requital for, what you used to do’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ye are requited) in the Hereafter (naught save what ye did) in the life of the world in your state of idolatry and disbelief.
